title: Automatic refresh gone MAD
text:
Please would you stOP AUTOMATICALLY REFRESHING THE ENTIRE APP EVERY SINGLE TIME I CLICK AWAY FROM IT. Like I just wanted to quickly switch to my browser to relay a message, you do not need to completely refresh/reload the entire app rewrite all of my emails, reinvent the email, and rediscover Internet, all just because I clicked away and wanted to come immediately back!!!!!!! Ahem. Thank you. This is getting bad enough I‚Äôm considering using the Apple mail app instead üò±üò¨

ALSO why do y‚Äôall hide emails you apparently think I don‚Äôt need to see?! I almost missed an entire acceptance email to the school I was applying to and saw it on the last day before the deadline only because I went to my Gmail on my deaktop!!! Phone outlook app completely hid it from me, even when I searched for the email by name in the search bar.

title: Improved since last look
text:
A lot has been changed or added since I last looked at this app.  I‚Äôm impressed at the improvements and giving it a serious tryout now. 

Kudos to the developers for seemingly taking feedback seriously

title: View preference list after closing
text: The app no longer remembers to only show unread messages after I close and reopen it. Must set it every time

title: Outlook
text: Sometimes I don‚Äôt get my emails promptly and I have to wait a while. But has cool features and love calendar.

title: Outlooks relevance to Modern Life
text: This is a great platform to send and collect large quantities of information. Outlook has multiple quality of life features that enable users to learn quickly, and navigate efficiently. Without an email platform that is fun, intuitive, and engaging to use, college/work life would be extremely difficult to organize and manage. Keep up the great work.

title: Ads in your mail list, and is slow to pull mail
text:
Recent update removed the ability to see message details in notifications without long pressing them. Now they all show 'new message, open app' by default instead of sender and subject line üëé

The app now has ads in a pretty disruptive location - they look like a normal email to click on. It's also never able to quickly pull mail down for MFA codes, I have to use the provider's website to get those

title: Love the Calendar feature!
text: I love how you can view the calendar as the entire month and still read your events. Email is easy to use and synced up with my other accounts easily!

title: Solid Email App

title: Unread View
text: I like to keep my email uncluttered and see new messages that haven‚Äôt been read yet. So I prefer to leave the filtering on ‚Äúunread only‚Äù. Since the update the app reverts to ‚Äúshow all‚Äù every time I close it. I understand this is a minor thing but to me it‚Äôs an important part of my workflow and efficiency in sifting through messages.

title: Emails never load.
text: My emails will rarely load in the app, they load just fine on my computer and I get push notifications on my phone but the app will consistently not load my emails. I‚Äôve tried all of the online fixes to no avail, the only reason I still keep this app is that my job requires it.
